column2: Chuck Norris once kicked a horse in the chin. Its descendants today are known as giraffes.
Chuck Norris has already been to Mars. That's why there are no signs of life.
When Chuck Norris works out he doesn't get stronger, the machine does.
The concept of algorithm has existed for centuries. It was used by Greek mathematicians , and the term derives from the 9th Century mathematician Mu?ammad ibn M?s? al'Khw?rizm? latinized 'Algoritmi'
An algorithm is an effective method that can be expressed within a finite amount of space and time and in a well-defined formal language for calculating a function.
For Euclid's method to succeed, the starting lengths must satisfy two requirements: (i) the lengths must not be zero, AND (ii) the subtraction must be proper.
Euclid's original proof adds a third requirement: the two lengths must not be prime to one another.
Cats are similar in anatomy to the other felids.
Cats can hear sounds too faint or too high in frequencyfor human ears.
Since cats were venerated in ancient Egypt, they were commonly believed to have been domesticated there.
The cat skull is unusual among mammals in having very large eye sockets and a powerful and specialized jaw.
